ygData.subject: Re: Beachcomber and Redhot
ygData.msgSnippet: Beachcomber nodded, uhhh, yeah. Something like that. he said. He turned to Redhot. Can you transform? he asked.

Beachcomber nodded, "uhhh, yeah. Something like that." he said. He
turned to Redhot. "Can you transform?" he asked.
